title: Scrollbars should be disabled in ImageAnalyzer example
description: The scrollbars in the ImageAnalyzer example are enabled but do not have any functionality. This is misleading, especially when opening a small image like an icon.
OB: When opening the ImageAnalyzer example in Build F2 (20020602) on Redhat 7.2 with GTK2KDE 2.210 (GTK2 only), the scrollbars are enabled and can be moved around.
EB: The scrollbars should be disabled in the ImageAnalyzer example.
SR:
1. Open the ImageAnalyzer example.
2. Notice that the scrollbars are enabled.
3. Try moving the scrollbars and observe that they don't have any effect.
4. Open a small image, like an icon, and observe that the scrollbars are misleading because they don't do anything.
